Marine Genomics 1 Introduction to Marine Genomics

Marine Genomics 1 Introduction to Marine Genomics Rachael Bay (rbay@ucdavis.edu) Serena Caplins (sacaplins@ucdavis.edu) Vanessa Guerra (vguerra4@ucmerced.edu) TA: Madison Armstrong (mlarmstrong@ucdavis.edu) Lecture Tuesdays 12:10-1:30, Coding session Thursdays 12:10-1:00 Office hours: Serena Caplins Thursday 1:10-2:00 PM Madison Armstrong TBD The bookdown package can be installed from CRAN or Github: install.packages("bookdown") # or the development version # devtools::install_github("rstudio/bookdown") Remember each Rmd file contains one and only one chapter, and a chapter is defined by the first-level heading #. To compile this example to PDF, you need XeLaTeX. You are recommended to install TinyTeX (which includes XeLaTeX): https://yihui.org/tinytex/.
